00037 btCollisionDispatcher::btCollisionDispatcher (btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration): 
00038 m_dispatcherFlags(btCollisionDispatcher::CD_USE_RELATIVE_CONTACT_BREAKING_THRESHOLD),
00039         m_collisionConfiguration(collisionConfiguration)
00040 {
00041         int i;
00042 
00043         setNearCallback(defaultNearCallback);
00044         
00045         m_collisionAlgorithmPoolAllocator = collisionConfiguration->getCollisionAlgorithmPool();
00046 
00047         m_persistentManifoldPoolAllocator = collisionConfiguration->getPersistentManifoldPool();
00048 
00049         for (i=0;i<MAX_BROADPHASE_COLLISION_TYPES;i++)
00050         {
00051                 for (int j=0;j<MAX_BROADPHASE_COLLISION_TYPES;j++)
00052                 {
00053                         m_doubleDispatchContactPoints[i][j] = m_collisionConfiguration->getCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc(i,j);
00054                         btAssert(m_doubleDispatchContactPoints[i][j]);
00055                         m_doubleDispatchClosestPoints[i][j] = m_collisionConfiguration->getClosestPointsAlgorithmCreateFunc(i, j);
00056 
00057                 }
00058         }
00059         
00060         
00061 }

00078 btPersistentManifold*   btCollisionDispatcher::getNewManifold(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1) 
00079 { 
00080         gNumManifold++;
00081         
00082         //btAssert(gNumManifold < 65535);
00083         
00084 
00085 
00086         //optional relative contact breaking threshold, turned on by default (use setDispatcherFlags to switch off feature for improved performance)
00087         
00088         btScalar contactBreakingThreshold =  (m_dispatcherFlags & btCollisionDispatcher::CD_USE_RELATIVE_CONTACT_BREAKING_THRESHOLD) ? 
00089                 btMin(body0->getCollisionShape()->getContactBreakingThreshold(gContactBreakingThreshold) , body1->getCollisionShape()->getContactBreakingThreshold(gContactBreakingThreshold))
00090                 : gContactBreakingThreshold ;
00091 
00092         btScalar contactProcessingThreshold = btMin(body0->getContactProcessingThreshold(),body1->getContactProcessingThreshold());
00093                 
00094         void* mem = m_persistentManifoldPoolAllocator->allocate( sizeof( btPersistentManifold ) );
00095     if (NULL == mem)
00096         {
00097         //we got a pool memory overflow, by default we fallback to dynamically allocate memory. If we require a contiguous contact pool then assert.
00098                 if ((m_dispatcherFlags&CD_DISABLE_CONTACTPOOL_DYNAMIC_ALLOCATION)==0)
00099                 {
00100                         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btPersistentManifold),16);
00101                 } else
00102                 {
00103                         btAssert(0);
00104                         //make sure to increase the m_defaultMaxPersistentManifoldPoolSize in the btDefaultCollisionConstructionInfo/btDefaultCollisionConfiguration
00105                         return 0;
00106                 }
00107         }
00108         btPersistentManifold* manifold = new(mem) btPersistentManifold (body0,body1,0,contactBreakingThreshold,contactProcessingThreshold);
00109         manifold->m_index1a = m_manifoldsPtr.size();
00110         m_manifoldsPtr.push_back(manifold);
00111 
00112         return manifold;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void btCollisionDispatcher::clearManifold(btPersistentManifold* manifold)
00116 {
00117         manifold->clearManifold();
00118 }
00119 
00120         
00121 void btCollisionDispatcher::releaseManifold(btPersistentManifold* manifold)
00122 {
00123         
00124         gNumManifold--;
00125 
00126         //printf("releaseManifold: gNumManifold %d\n",gNumManifold);
00127         clearManifold(manifold);
00128 
00129         int findIndex = manifold->m_index1a;
00130         btAssert(findIndex < m_manifoldsPtr.size());
00131         m_manifoldsPtr.swap(findIndex,m_manifoldsPtr.size()-1);
00132         m_manifoldsPtr[findIndex]->m_index1a = findIndex;
00133         m_manifoldsPtr.pop_back();
00134 
00135         manifold->~btPersistentManifold();
00136         if (m_persistentManifoldPoolAllocator->validPtr(manifold))
00137         {
00138                 m_persistentManifoldPoolAllocator->freeMemory(manifold);
00139         } else
00140         {
00141                 btAlignedFree(manifold);
00142         }
00143         
00144 }

00149 btCollisionAlgorithm* btCollisionDispatcher::findAlgorithm(const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,btPersistentManifold* sharedManifold, ebtDispatcherQueryType algoType)
00150 {
00151         
00152         btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo ci;
00153 
00154         ci.m_dispatcher1 = this;
00155         ci.m_manifold = sharedManifold;
00156         btCollisionAlgorithm* algo = 0;
00157         if (algoType == BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS)
00158         {
00159                 algo = m_doubleDispatchContactPoints[body0Wrap->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType()][body1Wrap->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType()]->CreateCollisionAlgorithm(ci, body0Wrap, body1Wrap);
00160         }
00161         else
00162         {
00163                 algo = m_doubleDispatchClosestPoints[body0Wrap->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType()][body1Wrap->getCollisionShape()->getShapeType()]->CreateCollisionAlgorithm(ci, body0Wrap, body1Wrap);
00164         }
00165 
00166         return algo;
00167 }

00172 bool    btCollisionDispatcher::needsResponse(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00173 {
00174         //here you can do filtering
00175         bool hasResponse = 
00176                 (body0->hasContactResponse() && body1->hasContactResponse());
00177         //no response between two static/kinematic bodies:
00178         hasResponse = hasResponse &&
00179                 ((!body0->isStaticOrKinematicObject()) ||(! body1->isStaticOrKinematicObject()));
00180         return hasResponse;
00181 }
00182 
00183 bool    btCollisionDispatcher::needsCollision(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00184 {
00185         btAssert(body0);
00186         btAssert(body1);
00187 
00188         bool needsCollision = true;
00189 
00190 #ifdef BT_DEBUG
00191         if (!(m_dispatcherFlags & btCollisionDispatcher::CD_STATIC_STATIC_REPORTED))
00192         {
00193                 //broadphase filtering already deals with this
00194                 if (body0->isStaticOrKinematicObject() && body1->isStaticOrKinematicObject())
00195                 {
00196                         m_dispatcherFlags |= btCollisionDispatcher::CD_STATIC_STATIC_REPORTED;
00197                         printf("warning btCollisionDispatcher::needsCollision: static-static collision!\n");
00198                 }
00199         }
00200 #endif //BT_DEBUG
00201 
00202         if ((!body0->isActive()) && (!body1->isActive()))
00203                 needsCollision = false;
00204         else if ((!body0->checkCollideWith(body1)) || (!body1->checkCollideWith(body0)))
00205                 needsCollision = false;
00206         
00207         return needsCollision ;
00208 
00209 }

00215 class btCollisionPairCallback : public btOverlapCallback
00216 {
00217         const btDispatcherInfo& m_dispatchInfo;
00218         btCollisionDispatcher*  m_dispatcher;
00219 
00220 public:
00221 
00222         btCollisionPairCallback(const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btCollisionDispatcher*     dispatcher)
00223         :m_dispatchInfo(dispatchInfo),
00224         m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00225         {
00226         }
00227 
00228         /*btCollisionPairCallback& operator=(btCollisionPairCallback& other)
00229         {
00230                 m_dispatchInfo = other.m_dispatchInfo;
00231                 m_dispatcher = other.m_dispatcher;
00232                 return *this;
00233         }
00234         */
00235 
00236 
00237         virtual ~btCollisionPairCallback() {}
00238 
00239 
00240         virtual bool    processOverlap(btBroadphasePair& pair)
00241         {
00242                 (*m_dispatcher->getNearCallback())(pair,*m_dispatcher,m_dispatchInfo);
00243                 return false;
00244         }
00245 };

00249 void    btCollisionDispatcher::dispatchAllCollisionPairs(btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btDispatcher* dispatcher) 
00250 {
00251         //m_blockedForChanges = true;
00252 
00253         btCollisionPairCallback collisionCallback(dispatchInfo,this);
00254 
00255         pairCache->processAllOverlappingPairs(&collisionCallback,dispatcher);
00256 
00257         //m_blockedForChanges = false;
00258 
00259 }

00262 
00263 //by default, Bullet will use this near callback
00264 void btCollisionDispatcher::defaultNearCallback(btBroadphasePair& collisionPair, btCollisionDispatcher& dispatcher, const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo)
00265 {
00266                 btCollisionObject* colObj0 = (btCollisionObject*)collisionPair.m_pProxy0->m_clientObject;
00267                 btCollisionObject* colObj1 = (btCollisionObject*)collisionPair.m_pProxy1->m_clientObject;
00268 
00269                 if (dispatcher.needsCollision(colObj0,colObj1))
00270                 {
00271                         btCollisionObjectWrapper obj0Wrap(0,colObj0->getCollisionShape(),colObj0,colObj0->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
00272                         btCollisionObjectWrapper obj1Wrap(0,colObj1->getCollisionShape(),colObj1,colObj1->getWorldTransform(),-1,-1);
00273 
00274 
00275                         //dispatcher will keep algorithms persistent in the collision pair
00276                         if (!collisionPair.m_algorithm)
00277                         {
00278                                 collisionPair.m_algorithm = dispatcher.findAlgorithm(&obj0Wrap,&obj1Wrap,0, BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
00279                         }
00280 
00281                         if (collisionPair.m_algorithm)
00282                         {
00283                                 btManifoldResult contactPointResult(&obj0Wrap,&obj1Wrap);
00284                                 
00285                                 if (dispatchInfo.m_dispatchFunc ==              btDispatcherInfo::DISPATCH_DISCRETE)
00286                                 {
00287                                         //discrete collision detection query
00288                                         
00289                                         collisionPair.m_algorithm->processCollision(&obj0Wrap,&obj1Wrap,dispatchInfo,&contactPointResult);
00290                                 } else
00291                                 {
00292                                         //continuous collision detection query, time of impact (toi)
00293                                         btScalar toi = collisionPair.m_algorithm->calculateTimeOfImpact(colObj0,colObj1,dispatchInfo,&contactPointResult);
00294                                         if (dispatchInfo.m_timeOfImpact > toi)
00295                                                 dispatchInfo.m_timeOfImpact = toi;
00296 
00297                                 }
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300 
00301 }

00303 
00304 void* btCollisionDispatcher::allocateCollisionAlgorithm(int size)
00305 {
00306     void* mem = m_collisionAlgorithmPoolAllocator->allocate( size );
00307     if (NULL == mem)
00308     {
00309             //warn user for overflow?
00310             return btAlignedAlloc(static_cast<size_t>(size), 16);
00311     }
00312     return mem;
00313 }
00314 
00315 void btCollisionDispatcher::freeCollisionAlgorithm(void* ptr)
00316 {
00317         if (m_collisionAlgorithmPoolAllocator->validPtr(ptr))
00318         {
00319                 m_collisionAlgorithmPoolAllocator->freeMemory(ptr);
00320         } else
00321         {
00322                 btAlignedFree(ptr);
00323         }
00324 }
